title: REG-Travis Perkins PLC : Director/PDMR Shareholding
content:
The board of Travis Perkins plc ("the Company") announces that on 25 September 2015, the following options over ordinary shares of 10p each in the Company ("shares") were granted under the Travis Perkins Sharesave Scheme to the person named below, at an option price of 1616p. 
  Name   Status   Number 
of Shares  D Grimason  PDMR 1,113 * 
*The options will normally be exercisable between 1 December 2018 and 31 May 2019 

 
In the case of queries, please contact: 
 
Sonia Fennell               Deputy Company Secretary                01604 683016
